attributes.additional_details:
All MPs and Public servants should be paid according to the following:
a) Cabinet members no more than £100,000 pa
b) MPs , no more than £60,000 pa
c) New MPs , no more than £45,000 pa
Councillors, both local, district, and council should be paid no more than their equivalent above.
Expenses should be withdrawn, and put on a par with normal corporations, where they need to be justified, and agreed by a qualified body. These to be published monthly for the public to see.

The purpose of public service is to provide an administration to the country. If yu achive your aims, you will be duely rewarded after you leave office. If you fail, you will not benefit financially.
